name: Indocement Tunggal Prakarsa Tbk. PT
description: Indocement Tunggal Prakarsa Tbk. PT is one of the leading cement producers in Indonesia and a key player in the construction materials industry. Established in 1985, the company operates a series of modern manufacturing facilities that produce a variety of cement products, including ordinary Portland cement, blended cement, and specialty cement. With a production capacity exceeding 25 million tons per year, Indocement serves both the domestic and export markets, contributing significantly to Indonesia's infrastructure development. The company is committed to sustainable practices, investing in eco-friendly technologies and initiatives to reduce its carbon footprint and enhance energy efficiency. Indocement's extensive distribution network ensures that its products are readily available across the archipelago, supporting various construction projects ranging from residential buildings to large-scale infrastructure developments. The company also emphasizes innovation in its product offerings, developing high-quality cement that meets international standards. With a strong focus on corporate social responsibility, Indocement actively engages with local communities, supporting educational and environmental initiatives to foster sustainable development.

seo.meta_title: Indocement Tunggal Prakarsa Tbk. PT - Leading Cement Producer in Indonesia
seo.meta_description: Explore Indocement Tunggal Prakarsa Tbk. PT, a leading producer of cement and construction materials in Indonesia, committed to sustainable development and high-quality products.

faq.question: What products does Indocement offer?
faq.answer: Indocement offers various cement products, including Ordinary Portland Cement, Blended Cement, and Specialty Cement.

faq.question: Where is Indocement headquartered?
faq.answer: Indocement is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

faq.question: What is Indocement's commitment to sustainability?
faq.answer: Indocement is committed to sustainable practices, investing in eco-friendly technologies and community development.
